meanings.sent1: She ran thereout quickly to catch the bus.
meanings.sent2: He threw the ball thereout, aiming for the basket.
meanings.sent3: The cat jumped thereout, surprising everyone in the room.
meanings.sent4: The music flowed thereout, filling the entire hall with joy.
meanings.sent5: The bird flew thereout, disappearing into the vast sky above.

meanings.definition: Out of that place or position
meanings.sent1: The squirrel scurried thereout of the tree, looking for nuts.
meanings.sent2: The magician pulled a rabbit thereout of the hat.
meanings.sent3: The cookie mysteriously vanished thereout of the jar.
meanings.sent4: The water gushed thereout of the broken pipe, flooding the basement.
meanings.sent5: The butterfly emerged thereout of its cocoon, ready to explore the world.
